pages.title: Tawuia
pages.text: $(l)Temporal Range:$() Paleoproterozoic (Statherian) - Mesoproterozoic (Calymmian - Ectasian - Stenian) - Neoproterozoic (Tonian - Cryogenian - Ediacaran)$(br2)$(l)Habitat:$() Marine$(br2)>$(o)incertae sedis

Tawuia is a disc shaped compression fossil found the late Paleoproterozoic or early Neoproterozoic until the end of the Ediacaran period. The organisms were multicellular and consisted of vaguely oval-shaped bodies. They may perhaps be something like slime moulds, or be microbial colonies or trace fossils of some other kind. The model in this mod is hugely oversized, whereas the fossils are only around 1mm diameter!
$(l)Eats:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Shears
